data.current_description: Retrieve a batch of tickets by ID (`ticketId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`).
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a batch of tickets by ID (`ticketId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Specify which properties to return using the `properties` query parameter. Returns a batch response containing the requested ticket objects and any errors encountered during retrieval.
data.reasoning: Description lacks details about output structure (batch response format) and doesn't mention the ability to specify which properties to return. Added clarity about response format and property selection for better AI agent understanding of what to expect.

message: Operation 'patch-/crm/v3/objects/tickets/{ticketId}_update' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details. Description explains input handling and validation well but lacks clarity about what is returned. Added explicit mention of the response (updated ticket object) to help AI agents understand the operation's complete effect.

data.current_description: Update a ticket by ID (`ticketId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Properties values can be cleared by passing an empty string.
data.description_suggestion: Update a ticket by ID (`ticketId`) or unique property value (`idProperty`). Provided property values will be overwritten. Read-only and non-existent properties will result in an error. Property values can be cleared by passing an empty string. Returns the updated ticket object with all current properties.
data.reasoning: Description explains input handling and validation well but lacks clarity about what is returned. Added explicit mention of the response (updated ticket object) to help AI agents understand the operation's complete effect.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/objects/tickets/merge_merge' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, missing_context, missing_output_details. Description is too vague about the merge process and doesn't explain input requirements or output format. Added details about which ticket becomes primary, what happens to the secondary ticket, and what is returned. Clarified that this combines two tickets into one record for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Merge two tickets with same type
data.current_description: Merge two tickets, combining them into one ticket record.
data.description_suggestion: Merge two tickets into a single ticket record. Specify the primary ticket ID and the ticket ID to merge into it using the `PublicMergeInput` schema. The primary ticket retains its ID while the secondary ticket is archived. Returns the merged ticket object containing consolidated data.
data.reasoning: Description is too vague about the merge process and doesn't explain input requirements or output format. Added details about which ticket becomes primary, what happens to the secondary ticket, and what is returned. Clarified that this combines two tickets into one record for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_summary: Archive a batch of tickets by ID
data.current_description: Delete a batch of tickets by ID. Deleted tickets can be restored within 90 days of deletion. Learn more about [restoring records](https://knowledge.hubspot.com/records/restore-deleted-records).
data.description_suggestion: Archive a batch of tickets by ID. Archived tickets are sent to the recycling bin and can be restored within 90 days of archival. Returns a batch response indicating success or failure for each ticket in the request. Learn more about [restoring records](https://knowledge.hubspot.com/records/restore-deleted-records).
data.reasoning: Description uses 'Delete' terminology inconsistently with the summary which says 'Archive'. Corrected to use 'Archive' consistently. Also missing information about the batch response format and per-ticket success/failure status. Added clarity about response structure for better AI agent understanding.

message: Operation 'post-/crm/v3/objects/tickets/batch/create_create' has semantic quality issues: missing_output_details. Added details about batch response structure and inclusion of ticket IDs for better AI agent understanding of the operation's output.

data.current_description: Create a batch of tickets. The `inputs` array can contain a `properties` object to define property values for the ticket, along with an `associations` array to define [associations](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/associations/associations-v4) with other CRM records.
data.description_suggestion: Create a batch of tickets. The `inputs` array can contain a `properties` object to define property values for the ticket, along with an `associations` array to define [associations](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/associations/associations-v4) with other CRM records. Returns a batch response containing the created ticket objects with their IDs and any errors encountered during creation.
data.reasoning: Description explains input structure well but lacks clarity about the response format and what information is returned for each created ticket. Added details about batch response structure and inclusion of ticket IDs for better AI agent understanding of the operation's output.

message: Operation 'get-/crm/v3/objects/tickets_getPage' has semantic quality issues: vague_description, unclear_purpose, missing_context. Original description is misleading - it describes single ticket retrieval but the operation is a GET list endpoint (indicated by _getPage suffix and 6 parameters suggesting pagination). Description conflates single-object retrieval with list retrieval. Improved version clarifies this is a paginated list operation, explains pagination parameters, and specifies the return format for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Retrieve a ticket by its ID (`ticketId`) or by a unique property (`idProperty`). You can specify what is returned using the `properties` query parameter.
data.summary_suggestion: List or retrieve tickets with filtering
data.description_suggestion: Retrieve a paginated list of tickets or a specific ticket by ID (`ticketId`) or unique property (`idProperty`). Use the `properties` query parameter to specify which ticket properties to return. Supports pagination through the `limit`, `after`, and `sort` parameters. Returns a paginated collection of ticket objects.
data.reasoning: Original description is misleading - it describes single ticket retrieval but the operation is a GET list endpoint (indicated by _getPage suffix and 6 parameters suggesting pagination). Description conflates single-object retrieval with list retrieval. Improved version clarifies this is a paginated list operation, explains pagination parameters, and specifies the return format for better AI agent understanding.

data.current_description: Search for tickets by filtering on properties, searching through associations, and sorting results. Learn more about [CRM search](https://developers.hubspot.com/docs/guides/api/crm/search#make-a-search-request).
